name: Grand Gin Rummy 2: The classic Gin Rummy Card Game
name_original: Grand Gin Rummy 2: The classic Gin Rummy Card Game
description:
Grand Gin Rummy 2: The classic Gin Rummy Card Game is a card game developed by GameDuell.
Grand Gin Rummy 2: The classic Gin Rummy Card Game is available on Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play.
